statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeInfo;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM EmployeeInfo WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM EmployeeInfo ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeInfo WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT employee_id, job_title FROM EmployeeInfo WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, address, hire_date, job_title FROM EmployeeInfo;
SELECT first_name, last_name, job_title FROM EmployeeInfo WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeInfo WHERE job_title LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM EmployeeInfo WHERE hire_date < '2020-01-01' AND job_title = 'Engineer' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, phone_number FROM EmployeeInfo WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY phone_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM work_history WHERE department='IT';
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date, position, department FROM work_history ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE termination_date IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees JOIN work_history ON employees.employee_id = work_history.employee_id WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date, position FROM work_history WHERE position LIKE 'Ma%';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, email FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, phone_number, hire_date FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM contact_details;
SELECT address, city, state, postal_code FROM contact_details;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, email, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, phone_number, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT e.employee_name, wh.job_title, wh.department FROM employees e INNER JOIN work_history wh ON e.employee_id = wh.employee_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, cd.address, cd.city, cd.state, cd.postal_code FROM employees e JOIN contact_details cd ON e.employee_id = cd.employee_id ORDER BY e.employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, email, job_title FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM employees WHERE job_title='Manager';
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS employee_count FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.employee_id = departments.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT name, email, job_title FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, name, phone_number, hire_date FROM employees WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%Sales%';
SELECT employee_id, start_date, end_date, department_id FROM job_history ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, city, state, zip_code, address FROM contact_details WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM employee_personal_info
SELECT * FROM employee_contacts
SELECT job_title, department, start_date, end_date FROM employee_employment_history
SELECT email_address, phone_number FROM employee_contacts
SELECT city, state, postal_code, street_address FROM employee_address
SELECT * FROM employee_contacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM employee_personal_info WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT job_title, department, start_date, end_date FROM employee_employment_history ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, street_address, city, state, postal_code FROM employee_address WHERE state='California';
SELECT employee_id, salary, currency FROM employee_salary WHERE currency='USD' ORDER BY salary DESC;
